DOC.brief_title: Weight Management Intervention Obese Women Live Birth Outcome Vitro Fertilization ( IVF )
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . There two group patient . 1 . The first group ( n=167 ) receive weight management intervention four month prior IVF treatment.The group randomize intervention start intensive weight reduction plan . The aim weight reduction reach close normal BMI ( < 25.0 kg/m2 ) possible time approximately 4 month . The purpose dietary intervention create negative energy balance induce weight loss . The intervention start 12 week low calorie liquid formula diet ( LCD ) thereafter , diet re-introduction weight control stabilization IVF treatment begin . Should patient reason unable fulfil LCD-treatment , anyhow individualized dietary counselling help loose weight time IVF-treatment . 2 . The second group ( n=167 ) start IVF-treatment directly without intervention write advice benefit weight reduction exercise . The group randomize directly IVF-treatment start treatment soon possible randomization , preferably within menstrual cycle . 2 . Tertiary aim follow-up 2 year randomization study questionnaires couple intervention control group . A special questionnaire cover weight couple woman pregnancy live birth conclude study . For woman achieve live birth index-cycle IVF number child also follow-up child perform assess medical record pediatric clinic ( applicable ) child health care centre cover birth data , general health weight child birth assessment date . Eating -habits -patterns quality life parameter assess three questionnaire fill randomization .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Indication IVF/ICSI couple Woman 's age > 18 < 38 year randomization First , second third IVF/ICSI treatment BMI > = 30.0 < 35.0 kg/m2 Willing participate sign inform consent Diabetes mellitus treat insulin Oocyte sperm donation plan Preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( PGD ) treatment plan Azoospermia know randomization Patient adequate knowledge Swedish ( understand patient information questionnaire ) QEWPR questionnaire indicate binge eat disorder woman Previous participation study
